        <message>So RecordFieldGetter is a script include OOB, containing only one function to get a single field value of a record from client side.

Ex: 
```javascript
var ga = new GlideAjax('RecordFieldGetter');
ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getValue');
ga.addParam('sysparm_table', 'sys_user');
ga.addParam('sysparm_sys_id', g_user.userID);
ga.addParam('sysparm_field_name', 'user_name');
ga.getXMLAnswer(function(table) {
  alert(table);
});
```</message>
